titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a tax credit to consumers based on fuel economy.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a tax credit to consumers based on fuel economy.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Hybrid, electric, and advanced technology vehicles

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an individual taxpayer who operates a passenger automobile or light truck a tax credit based upon the average fuel economy of such vehicle. Terminates the tax credit for alternative motor vehicles.
